bwwExcerpt: Tyne Daly is such an intelligent, honest, unpredictable talent that, despite the obvious casting improbabilities in the new Broadway revival, we keep waiting for her to pull it off. As directed by opera-pro Stephen Wadsworth, Daly gets the hardhearted parts nailed, perhaps too well. Her face is made up into a frozen gorgon mask.
